articles.title: Spain: Temperatures soar to potential record high of 47.2C - ITV News
articles.description: Spain set a new provisional heat record of 47.2C on Saturday, as Southern Europe sweltered under a relentless summer sun.
articles.content:
Spain set a new provisional heat record of 47.2C on Saturday, as Southern Europe sweltered under a relentless summer sun.

articles.content:

articles.title: Pharma giants including Germany's BioNTech set to make billions from Covid-19 booster jab - The Local Europe
articles.description: Medical companies Pfizer, Moderna and Germany's BioNTech are expected to see soaring profits to the tune of billions of dollars from Covid-19 booster shots, analysts and investors have announced.
